title: Can We Resurrect the Extinct Neanderthals? Experts Debate

sora_prompt.headline: Can We Resurrect the Extinct Neanderthals? Experts Debate
scenes: [establishing] A modern newsroom with journalists and a backdrop of genetic research equipment, setting up for an in-depth discussion.
[action/subject] Scientists are seated around a conference table engaged in animated conversation about the potential to bring Neanderthals back through de-extinction technologies like CRISPR.
[context visual] A large screen displaying DNA sequences and genetic maps, with highlighted segments indicating human ancestry.

VoiceOver: 'With recent advancements in gene editing technology such as CRISPR, the possibility of resurrecting extinct species has entered into serious scientific discourse. However, while about 1-2% of non-African modern humans carry Neanderthal DNA due to historical interbreeding events, experts are divided on whether reviving a long-extinct hominid is ethical or even feasible.'
